messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: not the dreaded "e" discussion
messages.msgSnippet: Everytime I see switch and then see an age that I still consider to be a mere babe, I just shudder.  And, then promptly go and burn an effigy of you-know-who
messages.messageBody:
Everytime I see "switch" and then see an age that I still consider to be a
mere babe, I just shudder. And, then promptly go and burn an effigy of
you-know-who <g>

Lynda
